justification: The data clump identified by key 43 consists of multiple occurrences where configurations such as namesrvAddr, brokerConfigPath, listenPort, and other related settings are being used across various classes. These settings are part of the domain of broker configuration and are essential for the operation of the RocketMQ system. By extracting these settings into a single domain class, we can encapsulate the broker configuration logic, improve code maintainability, and ensure consistency across the system.
